talents.name: Starship Adversary 1

talents.name: Concentrated Fire
talents.description: As an action, make an :average: Leadership check. All llies on up to 4 ships in the encounter gain :advantage::advantage: on all Gunnery checks until the beginning of Ackbar’s next turn.
